channel.title: Windows 7 sucks
channel.description:
Windows 7 sucks.
Well, I was making a movie. Then I noticed windows 7 has no movie maker. So, I went to my XP partition and ran that moviemaker. It couldn't view the videos, so I went to the Vista partition and got that moviemaker. It worked perfectly... Until... I had to save the movie... After 30 minutes of editing, I clicked save project and the damn moviemaker locked up. FFS Microsoft, get your coding right...
Dsicuss this ultra fail.

item.title: Windows 7 sucks
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“ThAt0n36Uy, post:20, topic:244820”][quote author=mwiebelhaus link=topic=321229.msg2542088#msg2542088 date=1227050568]

Windows 7 sucks.

Well, I was making a movie. Then I noticed windows 7 has no movie maker. So, I went to my XP partition and ran that moviemaker. It couldn’t view the videos, so I went to the Vista partition and got that moviemaker. It worked perfectly… Until… I had to save the movie… After 30 minutes of editing, I clicked save project and the damn moviemaker locked up. FFS Microsoft, get your coding right…

Dsicuss this ultra fail.

And this makes it sucks because your a fucking idiot who is using a beta system and even more using Window Maker? There is a reason why there removed it, BECAUSE IT SUCKS.
[/quote]

Or because you’re a fucking retard?[/quote]Yeah, I’m going to agree that mwieb is a retard.

Read full topic
